subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Injuries to the early favorites gave Nibali a clear path to becoming the race’s first Italian champion in 16 years as he captured a Tour filled with cold and rainy weather.
snippet: Injuries to the early favorites gave Nibali a clear path to becoming the race’s first Italian champion in 16 years as he captured a Tour filled with cold and rainy weather.
